page.title: 08GAMES
page.content: At school we play such games as : rounders, British Bulldog, Kick the can.We play such games like non-stop cricket,stool ball and badminton.We play dodge ball,netball, and foot ball outside.In side we play chess, snakes and ladders, ludo, jigsaws etc. All these mentioned are "school" games but we play other games which we organise ourselves such as : Across the bottom, Rotten Egg, Golden River and Tiggy.Golden river this is the way to play it. You get about ten people. One of them stands in the middle of the space and the rest stands at the side. The person in the middle calls a colour.Then if the people at the side have that colour on they go across to the other side and the rest run across. If the person in the middle catches one of them. that person is "on" and it just carries on.
